articles.author: Jess Cartner-Morley
articles.title: Burberry's Riccardo Tisci taps into the fluid generation - The Guardian
articles.description: Collection inspired by the ‘great outdoors’ featured silk skirts and women but was entirely menswear
articles.content: There were elegant pleated silk skirts and several of the models were women, but Burberrys latest catwalk show filmed in the brands empty and shuttered London flagship store and live-streamed as part… [+3383 chars]

articles.title: Live music 'at the back of queue to reopen' - BBC News
articles.description: Music and live events bosses have had their say on the PM's new roadmap out of Covid restrictions.
articles.content:
image copyrightGetty Images
The chief executive of a live music trade body has said the industry is "at the back of the queue to re-open" once coronavirus restrictions are lifted.
